inputs.name: useGlobalTool
inputs.label: Use .NET global tool version instead of SDK provided one.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use .NET global tool version instead of SDK provided one.

inputs.name: severity
inputs.label: Severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: The severity of diagnostics to fix.

inputs.name: custom
inputs.label: Custom command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to pass to `dotnet-format` for execution.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working directory path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A path to a folder containing global.json. If a path is not specified then the local path on the agent where the source code files are downloaded will be used.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.label: Workspace path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A path to a solution file, a project file, or a folder containing a solution or project file. If a path is not specified then the current directory is used.

inputs.name: onlyChangedFiles
inputs.label: PullRequest mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the task will only check changed files in the current pull request.

inputs.name: includes
inputs.label: Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: A newline separated list of relative file or folder paths to include in formatting. All files are formatted if empty.

inputs.name: excludes
inputs.label: Exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: A newline separated list of relative file or folder paths to exclude from formatting.

inputs.name: noRestore
inputs.label: No restore
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, doesn't execute an implicit restore before formatting.

inputs.name: includeGenerated
inputs.label: Format files generated by the SDK.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, format files generated by the SDK.

inputs.name: diagnostics
inputs.label: Diagnostics filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma (`,`) separated list of diagnostic ids to use as a filter when fixing code style or 3rd party issues.

inputs.name: diagnosticsExcluded
inputs.label: Diagnostics exclusion filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma (`,`) separated list of diagnostic ids to ignore when fixing code style or 3rd party issues.

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the amount of detail displayed in the output.

inputs.name: fileGlobPatterns
inputs.label: File include pattern (glob based)
inputs.helpMarkDown: A newline separated list of glob patterns for files to include in formatting.
